mapper.select: select COUNT(*) cnt from cartitem where id=#{id} and pnum=#{pnum}
mapper.update: update cartitem set qty = qty + #{qty} where id=#{id} and pnum=#{pnum}
mapper.select: select p.pnum, p.pname, p.image, c.qty, p.price, p.stock from product p, cartitem c where p.pnum = c.pnum and c.id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete cartitem where id=#{id} and pnum=#{pnum}
mapper.insert: insert into cartitem_log values (log_seq.nextval, #{id}, (select scnum from product where pnum = #{pnum}), sysdate, 'cart_in')
